Pre-Game Insights: India could experiment with new faces in the final T20I against Bangladesh.
Harshit Rana, Tilak Verma, Ravi Bishnoi, and Jitesh Sharma are among the new players who might get a chance.
India's all-out attacking style of cricket is being followed.
Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma need to perform well as misfiring openers.
